com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils

Class NBTUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils.NBTUtil

  • public class NBTUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utility functions for dealing with NBT data

      • createHandle

        public static java.lang.Object createHandle(java.lang.Object data)
        Creates an NBT Tag handle to store the data specified in
        All primitive types, including byte[] and int[], and list/maps are supported
        Parameters:
        data - to store in this handle initially
        Returns:
        new handle

      • getData

        public static java.lang.Object getData(java.lang.Object nbtTagHandle)
        Obtains the raw data from an NBT Tag handle. NBTTagList and NBTTagCompound return a List and Map of NBT Tags respectively. If a null handle is specified, null is returned to indicate no data.
        Parameters:
        nbtTagHandle - to get the value of
        Returns:
        the NBTTag data

      • getTypeId

        public static byte getTypeId(java.lang.Object nbtTagHandle)
        Gets the type Id of the tag used to identify it
        Parameters:
        nbtTagHandle - to read from
        Returns:
        tag type id

      • readCompound

        public static java.lang.Object readCompound(java.io.InputStream stream)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an NBTTagCompound handle from an input stream. This method expects an Input Stream containing GZIP-compressed data.
        Parameters:
        stream - to read from
        Returns:
        NBTTagCompound
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readCompoundUncompressed

        public static java.lang.Object readCompoundUncompressed(java.io.InputStream stream)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an NBTTagCompound handle from an input stream. This method expects an Input Stream containing raw, uncompressed data.
        Parameters:
        stream - to read from
        Returns:
        NBTTagCompound
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writeCompound

        public static void writeCompound(java.lang.Object compound,
                 java.io.OutputStream stream)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Writes an NBTTagCompound to an output stream. This method writes the compound as GZIP-compressed data.
        Parameters:
        compound - to write
        stream - to write to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
